username_size: Username must have min 4 and max 32 characters
password_size: Password must be at least 6 characters
password_pattern: Password must atleast contain 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and a number
email_inuse: This email is already taken, please choose a different one
account_activation_failure: This is account is either active or the token is invalid
unauthorized_user_update: You are not authorized to update user
unauthorized_user_delete: You are not authorized to delete user
unauthorized_password_creation: You are not authorized to create a password
description_size: Password description must be greater than 2 and less than 64 characters
spassword_size: Password must be greater than 3 and less than 33 characters
unauthorized_password_load: You are not authorized to load Passwords
unauthorized_password_delete: You are not authorized to delete this Password
unauthorized_otp_verification: You are not authorized to verify this otp
